#summary Minimum Runtime Requirements
#sidebar TableOfContents

This version of the JW Player Open Ad Streamer has been tested with:

  * Longtail Video's [http://www.longtailvideo.com/players/jw-flv-player/ JW Player FLV Player 4.5] 

Please use this (or a later version) with the plugin.

In terms of protocol support, the release has been tested with:

  * HTTP pseudo-streaming MP4/FLV using [http://www.lighttpd.net Lighttpd] with the [http://h264.code-shop.com/trac/wiki/Mod-H264-Streaming-Lighttpd-Version2 H.264 streaming module]
  * RTMP using an Adobe Flash Media Server (running on an [www.influxis.com Influxis] account)
